i have a phat, lt 2.0 latest dash

INSTRUCTIONS HOW TO PLAY THE GAME FROM HDD

1.inject lt2.0 topology
2.burn like every other xgd3 game (trancuate)
3. install to hdd
4. now copy a mp3 song to usb stick and put it in your xbox and play the song, while the song plays start max payne 3, if you do not play a song the disc keeps spinning and after 3 min you get a authorization error, the song stops the drive from spinning the dvd and there is no error, don't know why this is so but it works

I can confirm that both discs works! 
The game works without LT3.0!

How to make them work:

1) Download "Patch LT3.0 ISO to LT 2.0" 
2) Run CD 1 with the patch.
3) Burn CD1 with ImgBurn (Truncate)
3) Put a MP3 song(just pick one) on a USB-stick.
4) Play the song, then start CD 1.
5) When the game starts, stop the song and enjoy the game!

You have to play the song before starting the game otherwise you will get " unreadable disk" 

Thats should do the trick. Just repeat all 4 steps with CD 2, and enjoy!

Thanks Boobsman for the upload!

Anyone who had trouble burning it. I shall share my experience:

I have Xbox 360 Slim with LT 2.0 dashboard 13719

Download Xbox Backup Creator, latest version I used v2.9.0.350 and download the LT 2.0 topology .bin file from thepiratebay

then from the Xbox Backup Creator: Go to Image Tools, click Action = "Inject", and then click AP25 Sector and select your .iso image file and then it will ask for the topology LT 2.0 .bin file, select the topology_for_lt2.0.bin file then it will say that it patched the ISO file.

Now you can burn your .dvd file in ImgBurn using the Optimal layer break and Truncate.

I tried this method, it worked flawlessly :)

Thank you boobsman!
